entry.em: ..COLD WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST THURSDAY

entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 20 PERCENT CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 18
NORTH WINDS AROUND 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SNOW SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 2 ABOVE
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW 30 PERCENT
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 5 BELOW

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 17
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 7 BELOW IN THE MORNING

MOSTLY CLEAR
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 2 ABOVE
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S
CALM WINDS

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
